All the information that represents a camera.

Method Detail

Follow

public void Follow(Entity e)
Set camera to follow an entity, dictated by how fast the camera is set to follow the entity

Parameters:

RotateWith

public void RotateWith(Entity e)
Sets the rotation of the camera equal to parameter

Parameters:

Update

public void Update(DrawService drawS,
                   long ticks)
Updates the camera

Parameters:
drawS - - draw service to modify the view with
ticks - - time elapsed during unpaused states

SetFollowSpeed

public void SetFollowSpeed(float speed)
Set camera's following speed. speed = 0.5f means it travels half the distance to the entity in a frame. speed = 0.1f means it travels one tenth the distance in a frame.

Parameters:
speed - - speed at which the camera follows the entity it's following. cannot exceed 1.0f
